Author: mushroomsandyoga
Text: Yeah I’ll see someone say they are my weight and shorter than me and be like why don’t I think I look good when I think they look great?

Author: deudeo
Text: It seems to be a common cognitive distortion among us. A lot of us have said that we see people of many body types as beautiful but ourselves to be an exception. We're all dumb in that painful way.
